name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where unauthorized scripts were executed, compromising system integrity.

action--a23c41e7-dc1a-49da-9eaf-fb8a59b1.name: Kill malicious process
action--a23c41e7-dc1a-49da-9eaf-fb8a59b1.description: Terminate any processes that are executing the malicious script.

if-condition--4e5f2905-e3e2-4530-b40f-eb.name: Check if configuration files are altered

action--4e5f2905-e3e2-4530-b40f-ebac0630.name: Restore original configuration files
action--4e5f2905-e3e2-4530-b40f-ebac0630.description: Restore the original configuration files from backup.

action--10f4c1fd-b8f4-43df-ae4e-4991c3c8.name: Monitor network traffic for suspicious activity
action--10f4c1fd-b8f4-43df-ae4e-4991c3c8.description: Capture and analyze network traffic for any suspicious activity indicative of backdoor communications.

while-condition--d5e29438-d407-4b86-bf6b.name: Traffic monitoring loop
while-condition--d5e29438-d407-4b86-bf6b.description: Continue monitoring network traffic until a detection threshold is reached.

config_file_altered.description: Indicates if configuration files were altered.

detection_threshold_not_reached.description: Indicates if the detection threshold for suspicious activity has not yet been reached.
